website_summaries.verdict: A nice pick for collectors of the internet cartoon cat who want to expand the number of characters in their collection.
pros: A favorite choice among Pusheen fans for the dinosaur decor, green fur, scales, and cute expression
Perfect size for snuggling – over 13 inches
cons: Dinosaur theme may not appeal to everyone, especially those who prefer Pusheen the cat

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Approved! =^.^=
customer_reviews.text: So soft and plush! Would recommend to all Pusheen fans! Cats love it too :3
customer_reviews.author: Maufus

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality & BEAUTIFUL color!!
customer_reviews.text: We have several Pusheen plush characters (all adorable/excellent quality) this one is my favorite. The light green is SO pretty--I can't stand it!! I bought this for my 11 year old daughter and then ended up purchasing one for myself. Too cute for words--you won't be disappointed. Arrived very quickly and in perfect shape. Thanks again, Amazon 👍
customer_reviews.author: Belligirl

customer_reviews.title: Pusheenosaurus is love
customer_reviews.text: I love this little [not so little 😅] pusheen plush! The color is a cool mint and the softness of the fur is to die for! It's squishy and I love that it's a dinosaur.... 💞 Possibly my favorite pusheen, but you know there's a lot more out there I gotta get my hands on! 😁 Overall, I would give this 100 🌟 if I could, very satisfied costumer, Amazon u did it again....
customer_reviews.author: Baconlovers411

customer_reviews.title: It is very soft and it comes with a holographic Pusheen tag which is nice. The length of thirteen inches includes the tail ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very special Pusheen product since I've never seen this Pusheen design until I saw this product. It is very soft and it comes with a holographic Pusheen tag which is nice. The length of thirteen inches includes the tail so it seems kind of small but it is still nice to hug. The colors are just like they appear in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Xuan O.

customer_reviews.title: it's adorable! This particular Pusheen is great for small children
customer_reviews.text: The kind of high quality stuffed animal I expect from Gund. The "fur" is extremely soft. And of course, it's adorable! This particular Pusheen is great for small children, as there aren't any small pieces or glittery stuff that could come off if tugged or chewed on. I bought it as a baby shower gift for my sister-in-law, and she was delighted - I just hope my nephew-to-be likes it as much as we do!
customer_reviews.author: Ornith

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: No idea that these existed but my daughter wanted to get one for her friend. I thought it was pillow sized but it is very small. I may have missed the dimensions of it. Its the size of a human head lol. It was a hit, so if they love these pusheen animals, they will love it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gingersnaped

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this while browsing and thought that my GF would absolutely love this and sure enough, she does! It looks exactly as pictured and is quite soft. Would buy another one for a gift again.

customer_reviews.title: So adorable

customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES his Pusheenosaurus!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yo. son has recently become obsessed with Pusheen - so I bought this as a Christmas gift. He about fell over with happiness when he opened it. He loves it. It's big and very soft. And you can't beat the price - given that the Little Tokyo store at the mall is selling tiny Pusheen stuffies for almost $20. If you have a Pusheen lover in your life, this is definitely a winner. :)

customer_reviews.title: A++, would buy again.

Definitely worth the cash if you ask me!

product_meta.title: GUND Pusheen Pusheenosaurus Plush Stuffed Animal Dinosaur Cat, Green, 13"
product_meta.description: Pusheen is the snack-loving cat who loves to go on adventures with friends like Sloth, Stormy, Pip and Cheek in her popular webcomic with over 10 million social media fans! This mighty 13" Pusheenosaurus was inspired by a popular web comic, and features a fearsome expression and spiky plush scales.
feature_bullets: Pusheen is the snack-loving cat who loves to go on adventures with friends like Sloth, Stormy, Pip and Cheek in her popular webcomic with over 10 million social media fans! This mighty 13" Pusheenosaurus was inspired by a popular web comic, and features a fearsome expression and spiky plush scales.
PUSHEEN + DINOSAUR = PUSHEENOSAURUS: Don't fear the original Pusheenosaurus plush with her angry expression and spiky plush scales. She's really a big softy at heart! Give her a squeeze and see!
SOFT & HUGGABLE: Made from a soft, huggable material that meets famous GUND quality standards, this plush toy features surface-washable construction for easy cleaning. Appropriate for ages 1 & up.

THE PERFECT GIFT: Our plush dolls, teddy bears, & stuffed animals make perfect gifts for birthdays, baby showers, baptisms, Easter, Valentine's Day & more! The perfect gift for any Pusheen or cat lover!

QUALITY CUDDLES: Known for quality, soft, huggable plush designs & gifts, our award-winning bears & toys appeal to all ages, from infants & toddlers to adults, perfect for play, collecting & cuddling.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars554 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
